explanation: [0-0] In a shopping mall, a woman in black is holding a laptop. A man in a gray hoodie to her right is pointing at the laptop with his finger. Behind the man in the gray hoodie is another man in a janitor's uniform, wearing a gray short-sleeved shirt underneath and holding a blue bucket.

[0-7] Then, the man in the janitor's uniform puts the blue bucket on the head of the man in the gray hoodie and runs over to the woman, knocking the laptop out of her hands. The man in the janitor’s uniform then runs to the other side of the shelf, takes off his janitor’s uniform, and throws it on the head of a tall man wearing a black hat who is holding a tablet. The man in the gray short-sleeved shirt then puts on sunglasses and pulls out a blind man's cane.
